name: Burnouts Alpha (Web Version)
description:
Meant to be played fullscreen!

Early test alpha for an RPG that takes place in people's minds with different mechanics for each party member and a charming/dark setting.

Been making this project on and off for the past few years inspired by Psychonauts, LISA, Earthbound and other similar games.

NOTE: UPDATING THE GAME WIPES SAVE FILES SO BE SURE TO USE THE SAVE EXPORTER!

Please leave any feedback like bugs, things you liked, or things you want to see here! (This game wasn't built for web so it may be a little buggy in places!)

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSchZ2UFKlqTw1p4AlbfsPa3HpJGhd1ulMcT5z7R...
